title: Exceptional Business Entry Environment
description: In 2024, Greece achieved a remarkable overall score of 96.58 in business entry, reflecting its strong digital public services and transparency with a score of 94.50.

title: Outstanding International Trade Facilitation
description: Greece's quality of public services for international trade facilitation scored an impressive 96.11 in 2024, showcasing its efficiency in global commerce.

title: High Tertiary Education Enrollment
description: In 2022, Greece boasted a gross tertiary enrollment rate of 166.67%, with female enrollment even higher at 171.99%, indicating a strong emphasis on higher education.

title: Robust Specialist Surgical Workforce
description: As of 2015, Greece had a specialist surgical workforce of 163.54 per 100,000 population, highlighting its strong healthcare infrastructure.

title: Significant Decline in Agricultural Sector
description: In 2023, Greece experienced a sharp decline in its agriculture, forestry, and fishing sectors with a growth rate of -26.83%, indicating challenges in this area.

title: Operational Challenges in Business Location Establishment
description: Greece's operational efficiency for establishing a business location scored 49.00 in 2024, suggesting room for improvement in this area.
